text: @narendramodi please re-tweet :: I really appreciate the precautionary steps government has taken to fight COVID-19.I request you to extend the janta curfew/lockdown and implement in on entire nation for more 4 days The COVID-19 stats of other countries in week 4 make it necessary https://t.co/fuZciXT4P6
